channel.title: How do i fix this error?
channel.description:
Can someone please please please tell me how i can fix this i have public int specbar = 10; and it still says this
client.java:302: incompatible types found : int required: boolean if (specBar = 10) ^ client.java:393: incompatible types found : int required: boolean else if (specBar = 3) ^ 2 errors
Can someone tell me what to do?? please

item.title: How do i fix this error?

item.description:
@enzroc wrote:

i think u just take the special bar to 0 cant remember if i did that with mine or not

Read full topic
